business_strategies.strategy: Building startup by taking what big companies have and building it for small guys
business_strategies.implementation: Framework mentioned but not detailed in transcript

business_strategies.strategy: MMDD framework - Make My Day Difficult
business_strategies.implementation: Ask employees to make the experience more fun, enjoyable, and rewarding
business_strategies.expected_results: Super quick easy win for employee engagement

business_strategies.strategy: Creative Commons Zero (CC0) for IP - open sourcing intellectual property
business_strategies.implementation: Allow community to own rights to product, enabling anyone to create derivative works
business_strategies.expected_results: More creativity unlocked, more memes, value returns to original creator
business_strategies.case_study: Cryptopunks NFTs and Nouns project with Jack Butcher creating merchandise

problems_solutions.problem: Difficulty reading subtitles while watching shows
problems_solutions.solution: Mind adjusts after two minutes to naturally read and watch simultaneously
steps: Give it 2 minutes for mind to adjust

startup_ideas.idea: Platform collaboration between streaming services and creators for viral marketing
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Driving resurgence and viewership of content through creator-generated viral content
startup_ideas.business_model: Revenue sharing between platforms and creators for driving viewership
startup_ideas.validation: Mr Beast's Squid Game reenactment got 100M views in 72 hours

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Being overly protective of IP and not allowing fan content creation
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing out on viral marketing and community engagement
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Consider open IP policies like CC0 to enable community creativity
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Third Eye Blind not allowing photos at concerts in 2004-2005, missing social media marketing opportunity

growth_tactics.tactic: Creators making content around existing IP to drive engagement back to original platform
growth_tactics.results_expected: Viral reach and increased platform engagement

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Create content around trending topics with high production value

trends_signals.trend: Open IP and Creative Commons Zero (CC0) in NFT projects
trends_signals.opportunity: Community-driven value creation and viral marketing

trends_signals.trend: Creator economy driving value back to original content platforms
trends_signals.opportunity: Symbiotic relationships between creators and platforms
